name: Friend-Matcher
overview:
Friend-Matcher allows users to see which of their Friends’ Friends they are most compatible with.

This works to blurr the lines between traditional dating and online dating. Friend-Matcher has the advantages that the pool of potential matches is already very good because the matches are from the user’s social circle, the user always has a friend who can do introductions, profiles are honest and joining one click as your profile is already filled out if you have a Facebook profile.

In addition to matching between friends and friends of friends Friend-Matcher has a group match option. With this option users join a hub which only takes one click and then are provided recommend matches from other people in the hub. This can be used to create a Friend-Matcher alternative to a traditional dating website where say Charlotte Singles join or for other matching purposes. Friend-Matcher is actively pursuing aiding in Clemson’s roommate matching with this hub option.
